Summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth

Summary: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
actors: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang

Summary: In the falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.
actors: Ivana Baquero, Sergi López, Maribel Verdú, Doug Jones

directorName: Bibo Bergeron, Vicky Jenson, Rob Letterman
Summary: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage.
actors: Will Smith, Robert De Niro, Renée Zellweger, Jack Black

Summary: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.
actors: Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Piper Perabo

Summary: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.
actors: Joel Edgerton, Tom Hardy, Nick Nolte, Jennifer Morrison

Summary: A man and woman are drawn together, entangled in the life cycle of an ageless organism. Identity becomes an illusion as they struggle to assemble the loose fragments of wrecked lives.
actors: Amy Seimetz, Shane Carruth, Andrew Sensenig, Thiago Martins

Summary: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.
actors: Emily Blunt, John Krasinski, Millicent Simmonds, Noah Jupe

Summary: A fantastical tale of an 8 year old boy's explosive reaction to meeting a new girl at school.
actors: Gyton Grantley, Noah Wiseman, Beth Aubrey, Eloise Joo
